text: Lost and Gone is an EP by the German power metal band Masterplan. Along with the songs, it comes with a video interview with the band, including new members Mike DiMeo and Mike Terrana. ==Track listing== # "The Master's Voice" (non-album track) # "Lost and Gone" (non-album version) # "Dying Just To Live" (non-album track) # "Keeps Me Burning" (album version) Category:Masterplan (band) albums Category:2007 EPs Category:AFM Records EPs
title: Lost and Gone
